The data object contains network configuration details such as VLAN name, subnet, gateway, and broadcast address. These elements are core components of an organization's IT network infrastructure, critical for the design, operation, and segmentation of network traffic. The item directly pertains to how network traffic is managed and isolated within different segments of an IT environment, affecting the performance, security, and scalability of enterprise systems. This classification aligns with the Infrastructure category because it encompasses physical and virtual resources that support the flow, storage, processing, and analysis of data.
